body_html:
I'm guessing you're using an old version of TensorFlow. HEAD explicitly bails if you try to do this: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L334.

We'd be happy to accept a fix to do the Hessian correctly @alextp Is there any fundamental issue here, or did we just not get to it?

body:
I'm guessing you're using an old version of TensorFlow.  HEAD explicitly bails if you try to do this: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L334.

We'd be happy to accept a fix to do the Hessian correctly  @alextp Is there any fundamental issue here, or did we just not get to it?
